summary: This is a brief internal email from a US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) staff member, inquiring about communication with the NYPD regarding a press conference related to the Epstein case. It indicates coordination between federal and local law enforcement.

events.title: Email about NYPD/Epstein press conference
events.description: Internal email sent within the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York inquiring about communication with NYPD press officials regarding a press conference related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The email is dated July 6, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019.
It shows internal communication within the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) regarding the Epstein case.
The email references coordination with the NYPD regarding a press conference, indicating joint federal-local law enforcement activity.
The sender's identity is redacted in the provided text, indicated by the placeholder '(USANYS)'.
